pkgmetadata.longdescription: Zero-Inflated Discrete Weibull Models // Parameter estimation for zero-inflated discrete Weibull (ZIDW) regression models, the univariate setting, distribution functions, functions to generate randomized quantile residuals a pseudo R2, and plotting of rootograms. For more details, see Kalktawi (2017) https://bura.brunel.ac.uk/handle/2438/14476, Taconeli and Rodrigues de Lara (2022) doi:10.1080/00949655.2021.2005597, and Yeh and Young (2025) doi:10.1080/03610918.2025.2464076.
